meanings.definition: The state or quality of being inevitable.
meanings.sent1: The inevitabilities of life include birth and death.
meanings.sent2: We must accept the inevitabilities of change.
meanings.sent3: The inevitabilities of Monday mornings always involve traffic.
meanings.sent4: The inevitabilities of nature are like the unstoppable force of a river.
meanings.sent5: Facing the inevitabilities of aging can be challenging but rewarding.

meanings.definition: Something that is certain to happen.
meanings.sent1: The team's victory was one of the inevitabilities of the season.
meanings.sent2: Inevitabilities like sunrise and sunset mark the passage of time.
meanings.sent3: The inevitabilities of a cat knocking over a glass are always amusing.
meanings.sent4: The inevitabilities of life are as constant as the rising sun.
meanings.sent5: His success was one of the inevitabilities of his hard work.
